com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Interface FatalErrorPageFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FatalErrorPageFactoryImpl

    public interface FatalErrorPageFactory
    This interface enables a plug in point for alternative error pages.
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WComponent createErrorPage(boolean developerFriendly, Throwable error)
      Create a WComponent to display as an error page.

    • Method Detail

      • createErrorPage

        WComponent createErrorPage(boolean developerFriendly,
                         Throwable error)
        Create a WComponent to display as an error page.
        Parameters:
        developerFriendly - indicates whether developer-friendly information can be provided in the error page (eg a stack trace). This should never be true in production.
        error - is the error that we are handling.
        Returns:
        a WComponent to display as an error page.
